msg:I stayed at the Westin Haitang Bay for half of my trip to Sanya. Upon check-in, there was an English speaking employee named Jason who helped me check in and added my WeChat to make sure my stay went smoothly. I was upgraded to an ocean view room that was beautiful. The hotel has a bunch of different pools and areas to relax. There is also a quiet beach if you want to get your feet in the sand. I don't think swimming is allowed. My room was very clean and I loved the walk in closet because it didn't clutter my room. The employees were all very polite and helpful, even the ayis. I got a free photo shoot and a bunch of other perks with my stay. I always appreciate the little things, like lavender oil during turn down service, that make your stay more enjoyable.

name:H‚Äça‚Äçi‚Äçb‚Äça‚Äço‚Äçj‚Äçi‚Äçe‚Äçj‚Äçi‚Äçe
info:Deluxe Seaview Twin Room

posted:Posted April 30, 2024
msg:Took my parents and friends to play in Hainan. From Haikou to Sanya. Stayed at the Westin Haitang Bay in Sanya. Booked a 3-day 2-night package online. Very favorable. Free 2 breakfasts and 1 night barbecue buffet. Enjoy the trea**ent of Maldives hotel. The hotel provides a butler for each guest. The butler contacted us one day in advance. Although the online said check-in time was 15:00. But the butler said that if there was a vacancy, he could check it in for us in advance. It was much better than in Maldives. Very humane. Thanks to the butler Luna. The hotel is very big. There are multiple swimming pools. You can play with your family. You can also paddle board, which is suitable for young people who like to take pictures. The waves at the beach are very big. Not suitable for swimming. But suitable for playing in the waves. So happy. There are also security guards who will remind tourists to pay attention to safety. Bath towels can be provided by the beach and the pool. Very thoughtful. The hotel upgraded our room. Fruits were delivered when we arrived. There were so many that we couldn't finish them. I like to eat mango. I asked the front desk for it. As a result, a pot was delivered. It was great. Stayed in the invincible sea view parent-child suite. They are all very big. Two bathrooms. No need to force it üòÇ. There are bath salts with fragrant smell. You can take a bath when you are tired. There are also toys and dolls in the room. Children's toiletries. Very satisfied. The hotel package includes a night buffet at the seaside Shuite restaurant. The waiter Aria Huang is very warm and thoughtful. Seeing that we ordered online, she sent us the lobster and coconut jelly that are unique to the Internet. It is very delicious. A very perfect stay. My parents and husband are very happy. There are also foreign singers to entertain us during the meal. üëç

name:G‚Äçu‚Äçe‚Äçs‚Äçt‚Äç ‚ÄçU‚Äçs‚Äçe‚Äçr
info:Grand Seaview King Room
info:Stayed in May 2024
info:Solo travelers
info:1 Review
rating:4.5
posted:Posted June 6, 2024
msg:24.5.13-5.18 I stayed at the Westin Haitang Bay for six days and five nights, and booked a premium sea view king room.
The purpose of this trip was just to relax by the sea, not to play any games or do anything. I just did nothing every day lying on the beach, listening to the sound of the sea and relaxing. I chose this time and place with this vacation purpose.
Before coming here, I looked at the Westin Haitang Bay Hotel after a friend's recommendation. After that, I also did some hotel guides on Xiaohongshu and read the enthusiastic recommendations of netizens. To be honest, if I hadn't seen that there were lounge chairs on the beach of Haitang Bay where I could lie on the beach all day, and this was what I wanted to do most on this trip, I would probably not have booked this hotel.
However, it was because of these reviews that I personally didn't have a particularly high expectation for this stay. So there was a little surprise.

Okay, let me talk about the points that I think are OK

1. It's off-season, there are fewer people and fewer children, which makes me feel very good. The hotel is well landscaped. You can see various swimming pools from the lobby, including children's, central axis and Westin's famous river pool, and then the pool where the dinner BBQ is. You can walk to the beach. Because I have done a guide, some people say it is far away, but I think it's okay. I took some photos along the way and it was actually quite fast. It took about 7 or 8 minutes to walk.
2. The room is very large. I read other people's guides before staying in the sea view room. When booking the room, it was also stated that it was a side view of the sea, but after staying in, I found that the sea view was very good. Of course, it can't be compared with the hotel with the seaside as soon as you go out, but I am also very satisfied (illustration in the picture above). The view on the balcony is very good and open. You can see some other hotels opposite, such as the most conspicuous Atlantis. The hotel is quite quiet. There is a swimming pool downstairs. Occasionally, there will be the sound of children playing, but the balcony glass door can basically isolate it.
3. There are lounge chairs on the beach! ! ! ! It's great! ! ! ! ! ! This is my favorite because this is the purpose of my visit! The sea is very open and the scenery is very good. The sea water is not particularly blue, but mostly green. The color changes with the color of the sky. The sand is very fine, the wind is very strong, and the waves are also very big, so there are safety guards at the beach. As long as they find someone walking into the sea to swim, they will sound the alarm and shout. Because it is the off-season, there are really few people. Compared with the Yalong Bay beach I saw, this beach is really satisfactory. I am very happy to lie on the beach every day. The scenery is very good. The sea, the sky, various tropical plants, white clouds, and dark clouds are all very good even if it rains a little. There are also young couples, small families, or young sisters and brothers who come to travel and take photos, as well as uncles and aunts. They all look great! That kind of happy mood can affect many people! Many young ladies on Sweet Potato said that when they walked to the last 100 meters of the beach, they really felt great the moment they saw the sea! It‚Äôs really happy for an inland kid like me! ! !
4. When I checked in, I was assigned a housekeeper named Cassie. She was very enthusiastic. Because I didn't check in at the time, the housekeeper helped me with other formalities and stored my luggage. Then she helped me choose a room according to my accommodation requirements, and then I went to the beach for a stroll. I was notified in time that I could check in, which was a little earlier than the normal check-in time. Usually, she would take the initiative to ask me if I needed anything, and she would respond immediately and solve the problems that needed to be solved effectively. When I checked out, it was Saturday and there were a lot of people. Because I booked the hotel's shuttle bus to the airport at 2:30 pm, she also helped me delay the check-out for an hour in this case. I am very grateful.
5. It is really close to the duty-free shop, super close, just a few minutes away! ! ! This is also the reason why my colleague recommended Westin to me at the first time. Although I didn't have this itinerary at the beginning, it was too close. I went for a stroll on two nights and spent some money unplanned. Then because it was off-season, the speed of picking up the goods at the airport was smooth and fast. Now there are coupons for booking air tickets on Ctrip in June. Everyone can try it, but it seems to be limited. Please consult Sweet Potato for details. 6. The first round of drinks in the mini bar was given upon check-in. But I didn't drink them. There was really a lot of water. When I saw Sweet Potato for breakfast, many people said it was not good. I think it was pretty good. There are both Chinese and Western food, and there are many categories. I ate it for five days and felt it was OK. As a Hunanese, I think the taste is very üâë. It can be spicy if you want it! Except for queuing for a while on Saturday, there was no queuing at other times. It was smooth to sit down, but you may sit outside when there are many people. Except for the last day when I felt a little hot, I felt it was quite cool at other times. The attitude of the restaurant staff is very good. 7. There are several swimming pools. When you check in, you can rent swimming props for free for one hour and experience it. You can also take a travel photo. Parent-child activities are given. There is a children's play area on the underground first floor, and there is also an outdoor one. Although it is not known as a parent-child hotel, it still has the necessary facilities and equipment. Of course, it cannot be compared with parent-child ceiling hotels. Because the wind is really strong and there are a lot of green plants, there will be leaves and petals in the outdoor swimming pool. I think this is inevitable. There will be lifeguards on the side, and they will clean the leaves in the swimming pool from time to time. I saw that many adults and children rented beautiful swimming props, especially those who wanted to take pictures in the river swimming pool, and basically rented rowing boats. I soaked in the swimming pool for 2 hours on two days. There were not many people, and it was really a bit cold when the wind blew. There are lounge chairs by the pool, and there is a place to rent swimming props. There are also free boxes for storing valuables in the back, which scan the face. By the way, the passage to the duty-free shop is next to this swimming pool. There is also an entrance to the elevator upstairs, which is very convenient.
8. Finally, when I was about to leave the hotel, I communicated with the housekeeper Cassie about my feelings during my stay and made some small suggestions. I felt that the housekeeping department attached great importance to it. A supervisor called me to communicate and found me to talk to me about this matter in person before I left the hotel. I think their attitude and awareness are still very good. I hope it can really help them.

Then let's talk about some minor problems

1. The distance from the airport is indeed a bit far. I took the airport pick-up service provided by Ctrip, which was based on the distance. Because it was the off-season, there were only three groups of people on our bus, and I was the only one from Haitang Bay. It took about 1.5 hours from the airport to the Westin. In fact, if you don't send other guests, it takes about 50 minutes from the Westin to the airport. It takes about 30 minutes to take a taxi from the Westin to the Wuzhizhou Island Pier.
2. The service is indeed not in place. First of all, when I was sent to the airport, I was sent to two other hotels in Yalong Bay. Other hotels would have staff in the lobby to open the door for reception, but when I got to the Westin, because I was the last one to get off, even the driver who sent me said that there was no staff to receive people here, really no; I went to Atlantis one night in the middle, and the contrast was also quite obvious. Whether it was picking up or sending people, the service of Atlantis was obviously better; the second was in the room. After I checked in, I found that the glass in the drawer was broken. As soon as I opened the drawer, I heard the sound of breaking. Then I checked in on Monday, and it wasn't until Tuesday or Wednesday that white slippers were placed in the room. There were no slippers before. Because I brought my own slippers, I don't think it's a big problem, but if it's other customers or people who pay more attention to this aspect, I think they might still mind it; thirdly, when I washed my hair on the first night, I found that the conditioner was gone. Maybe the cleaning staff forgot to check and replenish it. I replenished it after telling the housekeeper the next day; finally, some cleaning details, including some other things, may still need to be more detailed. Two rounds of cleaning every day are quite in place.
3. When booking, Ctrip reminded me that there are benefits for consecutive stays, and I am a gold card member of Marriott, but when I checked in at the front desk, I didn't actually enjoy the benefits such as room upgrades or other services, and the day before I came, I found that the room price of the same type on Dianping was hundreds cheaper. I explained this problem at the front desk, but it didn't seem to be of any use. However, during the communication process, the front desk lady gave me breakfast, one a day, and I was very grateful. But when I went to have breakfast on the third day, the staff found that there was no breakfast in my room card. At that time, because the housekeeper was resting and I couldn't contact him in time, I went to the front desk to ask. The front desk replied that I needed to contact the staff who received me at that time, but I was given a note to go to dinner. During the meal, my housekeeper called and explained the situation and quickly helped me solve the problem.
4. The facilities in the room can be upgraded a little. For example, you can add a USB port. Because the panels I looked at are relatively old, and some are even loose ÔºûÔºú In addition, the TV is a little small, and the sound and picture are a little out of sync with the screen. The bathtub in the room is indeed in the middle of the room. I think it's OK because I live alone. There seems to be a dragging partition on the side, but if it is a family of several generations, I think it may be a little bit not OK. Give you a reference.

The room does smell like white tea, and the whole hotel is white tea. There are a lot of mosquitoes in the lobby, please pay attention!

In short, although this 6-day, 5-night trip was a little bit imperfect, I am still quite satisfied. If I have the opportunity to lie on the beach again in the future, I will probably still choose the Westin Haitang Bay Hotel. I hope the hotel pays attention to the operation of Xiaohongshu. I hope you will get better and better!

ps: Don‚Äôt believe the weather forecast in Sanya*^‚óé^* I checked it before and it rained for five of the six days. As a result, the first three days were sunny during the day, and it started to rain heavily at five or six in the afternoon. There was no rain in the last three days. However, after the rain at night, the sky was really blue and beautiful the next morning.
Another ps: Haitang Bay is relatively close to Wuzhizhou Island. You can see Wuzhizhou Island on the beach, and Xi Island is a little farther away.

1. The upgraded room experience was great! The hotel upgraded the room based on the room status of the day when I brought my child. When I opened the door, I saw the park landscape, which was a perfect visual experience.
2. The check-in experience was great! I was sent back to the room all the time on the same day, and introduced the hotel settings and baby's play in detail. I was very patient and gave so many welcome fruits that I was surprised.
3. The rich breakfast experience was great! Chinese, Western and Hainan specialties were all available, and there were special tableware for babies. Every day, various staff would greet you, and you would have the illusion of being in Bali.
4. The beach buffet for dinner tasted good and the service was great! The lobster was super delicious, and the staff also patiently distributed mosquito repellent.
5. The Chinese restaurant tasted super good! The foreman sister came from Sheraton and always recommended her apprentice Qiumei. The service was really good and she got full marks! The beef cubes and Wenchang chicken fried chicken were delicious, and they also gave me mango sago.
6. I highly recommend paddle boards and surfboards. Both children and adults had fun playing with them.
7. Things that touched me the most during my stay:
(1) I choked on water in the swimming pool and got stuck on the swimming ring. The lifeguard helped me immediately and paid attention to me. He was professional and considerate.
(2) My family member was unwell during our stay. The hotel kindly provided a thermometer, helped deliver medicines and takeout, and helped delay check-out. They were thoughtful and considerate.

name:G‚Äçu‚Äçe‚Äçs‚Äçt‚Äç ‚ÄçU‚Äçs‚Äçe‚Äçr
info:Deluxe Seaview Room
info:Stayed in April 2024
info:Family
info:5 Reviews
rating:2
posted:Posted April 29, 2024
msg:I checked into this hotel on April 26, 2024, and was about to check out on the 28th. My child wanted to play in the hotel's swimming pool again, and after playing for a while, he wanted to change a swimming ring, so I went to the service station next to the swimming pool to rent a swimming ring. During these few minutes, a terrible thing happened. The child actually drowned. At the time of the incident, there were three lifeguard positions next to the swimming pool, and no one was on duty! The child had been drowning in the water for a long time, more than two minutes! One of the lifeguards was positioned opposite the child's drowning position and was less than five meters away, but none of the lifeguards who were supposed to protect his life were there! Later, the child's mother found him and shouted, and the hotel lifeguard ran over. Finally, he was rescued by a kind-hearted guest staying in the hotel. The child cried for half an hour, and no one from the hotel cared about him during this half hour. Afterwards, we asked to check the hotel surveillance to understand what happened. The hotel first said that the surveillance was blind and then refused to provide surveillance because of regulations. We found the camera that could see the pool by ourselves, but the hotel claimed that it had privacy regulations and could not show it to us. It could not provide relevant regulations. It took four hours. We called the police and saw from the surveillance video of the incident provided by the police that there was no lifeguard on the lifeguard seat to protect the guests' lives during the whole process! The video shows that the child drowned for more than two minutes! If it is not discovered in time, it will definitely pay the price of life. In the more than four hours of asking the hotel for surveillance, knowing that he had left his post without permission and almost caused a life accident, we went to the swimming pool many times and saw that the lifeguard was still off duty on the seat! It is simply treating the lives of tourists as worthless! The hotel's disregard for the safety of tourists' lives and the serious problems of safety management! When a safety accident occurs, the attitude of refusing to investigate and the attitude of not making timely rectifications, once such a hotel is in danger, it is not only a family tragedy! It is also a social tragedy! As the leader of the national tourist city, such a situation should not happen! Do you still want to go to a hotel like this? If you bring children, I advise you to think carefully. Would you stay in a hotel without such security?

msg:Service: The service is superb. From check-in to check-out, every step is just like the "peak-end law" described by Daniel Kahneman in "Thinking Fast and Slow". Although the service manager does not understand behavioral psychology, he To truly implement this concept, the essence of a hotel is service, and all services revolve around people. This is something Westin Hotel has done well.

Environment: The sand of Haitang Bay beach is finer than Yalong Bay, with less impurities, making it suitable for parent-child activities. However, it should be noted that the waves here are generally larger than those of Sanya Bay and Yalong Bay. Children must pay special attention to safety when playing! If you go to the beach at night, you can consider digging for sand crabs. You don‚Äôt need to be taxed by people on the beach who claim to be digging crabs. Just be sure to bring a light.


Facilities: The Westin Hotel belongs to Haitang Bay. It was developed in Sanya Bay and Yalong Bay. The overall facilities are newer than those in Sanya Bay and Yalong Bay. Free family bicycle tours are provided when you check in. There are also parent-child club activities, so you want to save worry and effort. Young parents can consider half-day care or full-day care to liberate their parents. The overall decoration style of the Westin Hotel is youthful, simple and fashionable. It is not parent-child style or luxurious style. I personally like it, but this is not hinder parent-child activities

Hygiene: The bathroom is divided into toilet, shower and bathtub. The dry and wet separation is better. The cleaning lady cleans it in a timely manner.

posted:Posted February 4, 2024
msg:I am very glad to have chosen Minsheng Westin for my trip here. The day before I checked in, the hotel manager, Ms. Ella Chen, took the initiative to call me and asked about the number of people and age groups in our group. She also asked if we had any special requirements and took the initiative to add them. WeChat also posted a lot of travel and shopping guides. On the day of check-in, because we arrived a little early at noon and the room had not been cleaned, we went to the Chinese restaurant to eat first. Maybe it took a long time in the car. My father suddenly became flustered and had symptoms of collapse. I hurriedly contacted the housekeeper Ella Chen to explain that the situation was okay. She immediately took us to send the old man to the room to rest, and she was also busy. During the stay, Ella Chen was responsive to all requests. No matter what time it was, sometimes even 12 o'clock in the evening, she would reply as soon as possible and make proper arrangements. Because this time we were traveling with two elderly people who were in poor health. He is also the butler of all kinds of troubles. But I have to say that because of her attentive service, I not only visited the duty-free city, played in the water with my children, but also took the elderly to the 301 Hainan Hospital to get medicine, and also made an appoin**ent with friends from Hainan to gather at the hotel. , nothing was wasted, it was such a fulfilling vacation. I would like to express my sincere thanks to Ella Chen. I also hope that such excellent management talents should be reused in your hotel. Finally, I wish Minsheng Westin a prosperous future and a large number of guests. .

name:K‚Äça‚Äçf‚Äçe‚Äçi‚Äç@‚Äçd‚Äçi‚Äça‚Äçn
info:Deluxe Seaview Twin Room
info:Stayed in September 2023
info:Other
info:4 Reviews
rating:5
posted:Posted September 21, 2023
msg:Let‚Äôs take a quick trip, Sanya is here for us.
I like the sea, so I booked the Westin Hotel in Haitang Bay because the hotel has the sea. I booked a deluxe sea view room (breakfast included). Before the person arrived, the beautiful butler Alla arrived on the phone and added WeChat for details. I sent an introduction to the hotel's services and the discounts in the duty-free city. We thoughtfully arranged a 9th-floor sea view room. The room was very large, 65 square meters. Standing on the balcony, you have a panoramic view of the hotel. In the distance is the sea, and diagonally opposite you can see the sailboat-shaped Atlantis Hotel. The oversized bathtub in the room is perfect for taking a bath. When you are tired from shopping, take a hot bath to relieve your fatigue. It is worth mentioning that after calling the front desk, disposable bath bags were immediately provided, which was convenient and hygienic and relieved worries about hygiene. It was absolutely considerate.
The room is clean and tidy, the bed and pillows are very comfortable, and the quality of sleep cannot be overemphasized. The housekeeper Alla also brought a fruit plate, which was great [ThumbsUp]
In addition to the ocean, the hotel is also separated from the Sanya Duty Free City by a wall. Shopping and eating are extremely convenient.
The hotel covers a large area and is equipped with a shuttle battery car that can go to the beach, lobby, and restaurant.
The hotel's breakfast is rich and varied, from 7:00-10:30. The time caters to the habit of young people who can‚Äôt get up. There should be applause [Clapping] here. The hotel has Chinese restaurant, Japanese restaurant, and open-air buffet restaurant.
It is also equipped with a children's playground, so parents with children can let their children play there without any worries.
It's off-season now, so there aren't many people. The environment of the hotel is quiet. The hotel's garden landscape design is unique, with coconut groves, green spaces, swimming pools, and villas cleverly arranged. Especially the big banyan tree in the middle of the swimming pool, with its lush branches and leaves, adds a touch of dark green to the blue swimming pool. Even if you go swimming at noon, you will not be afraid of the sun [Grin].
The hotel has 4 swimming pools. The largest swimming pool is connected to the river swimming pool where you can paddle board. These swimming pools do not have deep water areas. It is very safe to bring children to play. You can also rent big yellow ducks, swimming rings, life jackets, and waterproof in the service area on the shore. bags, and you can even rent pedal tandem bicycles. The swimming pool and river paddle boarding are one of the features of the hotel. There is also an infinity swimming pool on the top floor of the hotel. The hotel has a travel photography service. You can make an appoin**ent with the butler. Each photographer has different skills, so I won‚Äôt comment here.
Paddling in the swimming pool river, the sun shines through the straight coconut groves on both sides of the water on the clear water. The eyes are full of green, and I can't help but take a big breath. The coconut groves are reflected in the water, and the top of my head is like the snow-white cotton in the cartoon. The clouds in the water were drawn into circles of white ripples, adding a touch of agility to the tranquility. The beauties in bikinis on the paddle board were posing in various photo poses. The photographer kept pressing the shutter, and couldn't help but say "so beautiful" in his heart.
When we came to the seaside, we saw clean sandy beaches, endless light green, light blue to dark blue sea, and the waves were hit by the sea wind and slowly retreated to the shore.
People in twos and threes are scattered on the beach. A child ran towards the sea, his father chasing after him, and his mother behind him holding up a camera to take pictures. Young lovers held hands and chased the waves; a little girl dug sand from the shore, and her father brought water in a small bucket. We just walked on the beach, treading water. The beach on the shore was soaked by the washed up sea water and actually reflected
Blue sky, white clouds. Come and take a picture of the Sky Mirror, it‚Äôs very photogenic here. The waves were roaring, and seabirds occasionally flew by. Although the weather is still a bit hot and humid, you can feel the cool sea breeze from time to time. Lying on the comfortable beach chair, you are actually hypnotized by the sound of the waves.
The 4-day trip went by in a blink of an eye. As the saying goes, good times are always short.
In the past few days, we paddleboarded, swam, the sea breeze blew, stepped on the beach, visited duty-free shops, ate refreshments, took photos of the hotel, and left our footprints.
The beautiful housekeeper Alla thoughtfully helped to reserve the airport bus and also applied for an extended check-out. I am very grateful to her.
The pleasant and comfortable trip is over, see you next time at the Westin Haitang Bay...

msg:The staff at the Westin Haitang Bay are very reliable.

The young man at the front desk is tall, white and handsome. He looks like the celebrity Ren Jialun. The check-in process is very smooth.

The maitre d's and waiters in the Chinese restaurant are also very reliable. They offer discounts and desserts if the food is slow in serving. They are very flexible.

The beef ramen in the breakfast room is really deliciousüòã. The soup base is delicious and the chili oil is flavorful. The ramen is strong and the cooking time is well controlled. Green garlic and coriander are rich in various ingredients. I ate one bowl on the first day and two bowls on the second day. The beef is particularly fragrant, and the more you chew it, the more fragrant it gets. Add chicken legs to the chef at this levelüçó! ! ‚ûï10 chicken drumsticksüçó.

The room attendant worked quickly and gave me a lot of mineral water. She said it was a hot day and asked me to drink more water.

There was a small problem with the air conditioner. The engineers from the engineering depar**ent quickly checked and solved the problem.

The food delivery guys are also greatüëçüèª

The housekeeper, Pepper, is very cute, taking care of us throughout the whole process, and is very considerate. Looks like a guest assistant.

The guy who drives the battery car in the yard is also very niceüëçüèª.

It‚Äôs not just one or two employees who are reliable, it‚Äôs the entire team that is reliable.

Hotels like this are rare.

The hotel facilities are generally OK. Water sports are particularly abundant. The toiletries are useful, the slippers and the bedding are comfortable.

Three suggestions are:

1 Go from B1 to the beach restaurant. The road on the right is the road with many villas next to it. The lights are too dark at night and it is a bit eerie. It is recommended to ‚ûïLight, ‚ûïBrighten. It was really scary for me to walk there alone. (It was so dark that I got lost on the first day, so I didn‚Äôt dare to walk there alone. On the second day, I went to explore the way during the day, and went there for dinner at night. When I walked there alone, I still felt that the unoccupied villa area on the right was eerie.) When I came back, I walked from the left Came back on a sidecar. I don‚Äôt dare to go to the right anymore.

2. The ice cream at the beach restaurant in the evening could be better. Not enough milk flavor, too sweet, too sweet, lacking the mellow and layered texture of ice cream. Buffet desserts need a little more thought. The oysters at the barbecue stall are grilled slowly, so you have to queue up for a long time. Be generous and bake more at a time. (I suggest you go to the Fairmont Haitang Bay Hotel to learn the "pai noodle" and "generousness" of barbecue)

3. The papaya for breakfast should be peeled, but it was not peeled. For a hotel like the Westin, breakfast fruits, such as papaya, should not be served with the skin on. Even if it is washed, the skin should not be left on. I peeled it early on October 6th, and took the skin off early on October 7th.

Overall it's a good hotel. (over)

The hotel provides free travel photography, including 5 7-inch photos + 1 photo frame, electronic files are $40/photo, and intensive photos are $60/photo. You can rent 2 sets of clothing for free in the photography studio (swimsuits, skirts, and props can be borrowed)

Booking on Ctrip, there is a shared car pick-up on the 5th domestic departure from the airport, which runs every half hour, but if you are in a hurry, it is not recommended to take it, because the car-pooling is for passengers from different hotels to share the car together. There are guests from Yalong Bay that day, so the car arrives first. We dropped off guests at Yalong Bay and went to Haitang Bay last, so it took us 1.5 hours to get to the hotel by carpooling. If we took a taxi from the airport, it would have taken us 40 minutes.

The children had no idea how happy they were when the cake was delivered to the room!
Cool Summer Adventure Summer Camp Theme Activities: Another important reason why I chose to stay at Westin this time is that their children‚Äôs summer camp has a lot of theme activities, and there are many suitable for older children, such as handmade wood products, cake making, and Surfing and paddleboarding learning experience, etc. My children are very satisfied with the arrangement of this activity!
Catering: The rooms we booked all include breakfast. The quality of the breakfast is pretty good. If you go on weekends or holidays, it is recommended to have breakfast before 9 o'clock. There are fewer people and you don't have to queue up, and the experience will be better!
For lunch one day, I chose the Japanese restaurant in the hotel. The quality of the food was good, relatively fresh, and tasted great!
For dinner, we chose the hotel‚Äôs seafood buffet restaurant, which is set in a garden near the beach and next to the swimming pool. It's better to go when it's not raining and sit in the sand area to dine, accompanied by beautiful singing. There are not many varieties of dinner, the taste is average, but the environment is better!
There is a duty-free shop right outside the side door of the hotel, which is very convenient for shopping! The night view is also super beautiful!
All in all, it was a great vacation experience! The price/performance ratio is also very high!

The swimming pool is at room temperature, but not cold, and the temperature is right. Shuiting beach self-service barbecue is very good value, a variety of desserts, sashimi, lamb chops, beer. I will definitely eat it again next time. It is recommended that you book a garden view room next time, because the big bed room faces the duty-free shop and has no view. Fortunately, it was upgraded for us this time. There are also children's classes every day. The teacher does not take the children to play games and bake. The children like it very much. There are also open-air movies.

name:A‚Äçn‚Äço‚Äçn‚Äçy‚Äçm‚Äço‚Äçu‚Äçs‚Äç ‚ÄçU‚Äçs‚Äçe‚Äçr
info:Family Seaview Suite
info:Stayed in November 2023
info:Other
info:3 Reviews
rating:5
posted:Posted December 4, 2023
msg:The Westin Haitang Bay Hotel is only separated by a wall from the Sanya CDF Duty Free City. It has an exclusive passage and is within walking distance to the duty free city for shopping and dining, which is very convenient.

The butler Parker took the initiative to contact me the day before check-in and sent me a map of the hotel and related facilities, which was very considerate. The hotel has complete facilities, nice garden landscape, large and numerous swimming pools, and more user-friendly services.

The two-bedroom suite I booked this time has a large balcony and a good view of the sea and hotel. There are two bedrooms, two large beds, two bathrooms, a shower room, and no separate living room. This room type should be converted from a one-bedroom suite. The original living room was converted into a bedroom. The room is quite large and retains a couch and a dining table for four, which is enough to satisfy a family of four on vacation. The only drawback is that the bedroom transformed from the "living room" lacks a power outlet at the bedside, making charging at night a bit inconvenient. It is recommended to provide a power *****.

The breakfast in the hotel is rich in variety, especially the freshly stretched beef ramen, which is an unexpected surprise. There are many people at breakfast and there is no executive lounge/breakfast room. The all-day menu at the hotel's western restaurant is quite satisfactory. The Chinese restaurant offers Cantonese and Sichuan cuisine, both light and hot, and the beef tendon Mapo tofu is recommended.

I am very satisfied with my stay this time. It is the only designated hotel in Haitang Bay. The pictures I took are more beautiful than the official pictures, so I won‚Äôt post them.

The beach connected to the hotel is very beautiful with fine sand. The hotel is also very close to the duty-free shop, which is suitable for friends who want to shop. The only thing is that the hotel's shower room and bedroom are connected, which feels like a lack of privacy.

When checking in, Damon chose a nice room for him, and gave a comprehensive introduction to Westin's various services, professional!
Minsheng Westin is next to the CDF duty-free shop. From the side door on the first floor, you can go directly to the side of the duty-free shop (not the main entrance). It takes about 5 minutes away, which is really convenient. The restaurant with Chinese elements in the hotel tastes good. The set menu recommended by the waiter is economical. The outdoor seating by the water is excellent. The swimming pools are all open. There are not many people and it is very comfortable. The river pool and the infinity pool are especially worth checking in. Many young ladies are checking in to take pictures. It is indeed very popular.
In the evening, there is a band performance at the Shuiting restaurant on the beach, a bottle of Corona or red wine, a pleasant life! There are also food courts and seafood restaurants around the hotel, especially the coconut chicken in the mangrove forest, which is definitely worth having. The hotel has a shuttle bus to the airport every day, you can book it in advance, it takes about 45 minutes by car.
Finally, I would like to thank the handsome guy Damon again for allowing us to have a comfortable weekend at the Westin. Minsheng Westin is the most cost-effective hotel in Haitang Bay. Next time we come to Sanya, we may choose Minsheng Westin.

name:F‚Äçe‚Äçi‚Äçx‚Äçi‚Äça‚Äçn‚Äçg‚Äçd‚Äçe‚Äçm‚Äçi‚Äçn‚Äçg‚Äçf‚Äçe‚Äçi
info:Deluxe King Room
info:Stayed in November 2022
info:Couples
info:10 Reviews
rating:5
posted:Posted November 20, 2022
msg:1. Overview | Overview
The holiday is limited this time, I only came to Sanya for a few days, and chose to stay in Qingshui Bay and Haitang Bay for one or two nights each. In less than half an hour by car from Qingshui Bay, the hotel is next to the duty-free shop, just one door away.
The building of the hotel imitates the bird's nest style, and it is mainly white and looks elegant and generous. The hotel is adjacent to the Duty Free City, and it is very convenient to have an exclusive passage to walk directly there.
Before check-in, Hannah, a hotel lady, added WeChat to communicate in advance. This is much better than the previous Raffles. From check-in to check-out, there is no human touch.
At that time, I didn‚Äôt notice that Westin‚Äôs swimming pool suites were all double bedrooms, which belonged to the sub-top-level room type below the villa. They said they hoped to upgrade. I don‚Äôt know if it scared them. However, the young lady helped arrange a two-bedroom suite with sea view. After reading the forum, it was the best room type within the normal upgrade range, and I was very satisfied.

2. Guest Room | In Room
Westin's two-bedroom suite is different from the conventional two-bedroom suite. It has an extra bed in the living room, which is more suitable for families with two children. It is good if you can live in this room type when you bring a beast. The bedroom is decorated for a honeymoon, and there is a little Westin tortoise doll on the bed in the living room.
Compared with the Raffles Clearwater Bay Suite I stayed in a few days ago, the Westin Suite is only half the size, but I think it is more appropriate to update the room. The Raffles Suite is a bit silly.
The room is well maintained, the curtains are all electric, and the living room and bedroom are connected to a large balcony. It is very pleasant to lie on the balcony chair at night and enjoy the sea breeze and drink some wine.
The welcome fruit is definitely much better than the business hotel. Although there is no expected coconut, maybe if you stay for five nights and upgrade to titanium gold, you may have coconuts.
Because it was a third-party reservation, I couldn't choose points. I chose red wine and snacks, and I also gave a small plate of fruit, but the wine and the fruit didn't have time to move. Another eight bottles of soft drinks are free in the room.

3. Catering | Dining
Due to time reasons, I only had breakfast at the hotel, with freshly squeezed juice, which I personally think is quite rich in Westin.
In order to take pictures at the infinity pool on the top floor, I bought a drink for 30 yuan. However, this kind of upstairs swimming pool has relatively few settings for charging guests, so let's think of it as a self-operated bar with a swimming pool.

4. Facilities | Facilities
In particular, I would like to praise the hotel's swimming pool. In addition to the central large swimming pool surrounded by the main building, there is also a swimming lane extending to the beach area.
In addition, the hotel also prepared a happy gift package, including 1 hour of bicycles, 1 swimming lap rental, and 1 kayak, so that people like me who can't swim can enjoy the fun of swimming.
The hotel has a lot of children's facilities, but it's not a holiday yet, there are no children, it feels like a quiet vacation.
The beach is relatively ordinary, and the sand is slightly thicker.
5. Unforgettable moments | the Moments
Entering the hotel, you can see many young ladies in white clothes, guiding guests at the front desk, very considerate.
Thanks to Miss Hannah for her arrangement, helping to upgrade the room and late check-out.

6. Summary | Conclusion
In the current off-season, for Marriott Platinum and above members, the price is only 1,000 yuan+. If you add Q3+ flash promotion, the actual cost may be only about 700. Sanya government consumption coupons can also be used for third-party bookings from Ctrip. The price/performance ratio is very good High.

msg:I will step on the pit of spending money, don't let everyone get slaughtered!
1. The hotel needs to pay for nucleic acid at its own expense. Those who have stayed at InterContinental, Mandarin, and Park Hyatt are all free nucleic acids for a limited time every day. According to the comrade Hao Yitong of the hotel, the government does not give them free nucleic acid. In order to better serve the guests, the hotel cooperates with a nucleic acid agency, and "deliberately" arranges a 15-yuan nucleic acid for the hotel guests (Sanya). The latest nucleic acid charging standard, the maximum is not more than 15 yuan)! I asked him again why other people's hotels are free of nucleic acid and the basis for the price of 15 yuan. The Ms. Hao Yitong asked me, "Does nucleic acid have anything to do with your stay in our hotel?" In order not to affect my mood, she was still willing to "please I make nucleic acids"! Thanks to the hotel for letting me experience the nucleic acid with the highest price and the worst service attitude in Sanya.
2. In the elevator, I overheard a guest asking about the rooftop swimming pool. For the first time, I also heard that the hotel's supporting facilities need to be charged extra to the hotel guests! It is recommended that the management of your hotel carefully consider whether to add the "breathing air fee" to the guests during their stay! After feedback on the swimming pool, they told me that the price is not expensive, just more than 20 yuan to buy a coconut, and also said that it can give me "free of low consumption". I do not need!
3. One side of the hotel is under construction, and the other is close to a large construction site, which seriously affects the check-in experience, and there is no prompt until entering the room
4. Ctrip reservations, including the hotel‚Äôs official announcement that there are 2‚ûï1 buffet dinners, only when we arrived at the store did we tell them to change to an ‚Äúequivalent package‚Äù because of the ‚Äúepidemic‚Äù. The funny thing is that groups can contract small buffets! The on-duty manager of the hotel surnamed Li told me that "there is no self-service, only a set menu. If you don't choose, you can exercise my right (love it"). The restaurant staff told the hotel that it was a quarantine hotel before. Because of the loss of money due to the epidemic, there has been basically no self-service since November 11, and the hotel only needs to do nucleic acid after replying to me, even if there is no self-service due to the epidemic. But the pages of Ctrip and Westin still use this as a publicity stunt to attract customers.
5. The replenishment of breakfast dishes is lagging behind, the temperature in the restaurant is high, there are many mosquitoes, and there are many mosquitoes in the room. I have stayed in many hotels in Sanya, and the bugs that Westin sees are the sum of all the bugs! So it's no wonder why there is a "Xiaoqiang" near the restaurant.
6. Compared with the price of 1300 per night in your hotel, do you think it is appropriate to provide guests with mineral water for a few cents? Can the management of the hotel drink it at home?
7. The net red rainforest swimming pool is also shared with the villa owners next to the real estate side. It is simply to maximize the benefits of the facility!
8. The floor next to the swimming pool is not repaired in time. When you step on it, it will obviously collapse and rebound, and it is easy to scratch your feet.
By the way, I found out that except for the last month, I have to add at least 150 yuan per day to the reservation.
This kind of hotel that has no integrity and sincerely deceives guests recommends Ctrip to punish it accordingly. No one will care about the small cost of 15.20 when everyone travels, but Westin's behavior of asking for "little money" can't help but lower his position.
Thanks to Westin, who single-handedly took out all the thunder of Haitang Bay Hotel for me!

The bathroom and shower in the room are independent and spacious. The walls are dark stone and give a cool feeling. The location of the bathtub is very reasonable, you can soak in the bathtub and watch TV. There is also a large reclining chair in the room, which is very comfortable to lie on. The super big bed in the big bed room is very soft and gives people the feeling of falling asleep, and the comfort is super high. The hotel is very large as a whole, with many swimming pools. I personally like the river swimming pool in the center of the hotel. It provides flat-bed kayak (easy to operate) and transparent glass boats (beautiful photos) for the guests. vacation time. There are a lot of free semi-enclosed sun loungers with umbrellas all over the hotel swimming pool and beach. There is also a high-altitude infinity pool on the 9th floor of the hotel but need to order drinks. The Lanzhou beef ramen for breakfast in the hotel is very authentic, as well as the tofu brain and pork and corn dumplings. The barbecue set included in the Ctrip hotel package, the barbecue platter is very rich, and the side dishes taste more western. Mineral water and minibar in the room are refilled for free every day.

Service: The personal feeling of the hotel service can give seven stars. The cici of the express service center took the initiative to ask the guests' needs, and arranged a honeymoon room for free and sent a fruit and a piece of delicious fruit cake. Because the flight to the outlying islands left the hotel at night, the room was extended to 4 pm for free. This is really too much. It's so humane, it's amazing. Because the hotel is very big, you can take a free shuttle bus at the concierge to get to the beach.

msg:I was worried for a while when I saw the bad reviews. After checking in, I found that the overall environment of the hotel is good, and the Marriott brand is still trustworthy. The most important thing is that the housekeeper Merlin contacted me in advance and upgraded the room for me. The check-out was delayed later, which was great.
In terms of location, the hotel is close to a duty-free shop, shopping and dining are very convenient. But because the building itself occupies a large area, although it is close, it takes 5-10 minutes to walk. There is a battery car in the lobby of the hotel that can be delivered to the hotel's main entrance, and then walk to the duty-free shop, you can take 1/3 of the road less.
In terms of catering, the breakfast is varied and complete, both open-air and indoor, which is dazzling.
In terms of service, the check-in time is really not short, at least 5 minutes, so be patient. Check out is quite fast. Fruits and coconut water will be provided on the day of check-in, which is necessary to cool off the heat. The waiter is basically responsive, and will give extra Hainan authentic snacks, and there will be a thoughtful note to prevent high temperature and heat stroke.
In terms of hardware, the rooms are reasonably separated, with separate cloakrooms, toilets, and shower rooms. The round bathtubs are placed in different positions according to different room types. If there is a round sofa bed in the room, it can sleep children. The diameter is 1.4 meters, pillows and quilts are all available, and children like it too. The outdoor balcony is equipped with racks for drying clothes, which is very intimate.
For entertainment, there are many swimming pools with a large area, and each swimming pool is equipped with a lifeguard. Sand dredging tools can be asked in the hotel service depar**ent. The lifebuoy needs to be rented or brought by yourself in advance. The rent is 30 yuan/hour.
For those who have a strong demand for shopping, staying in Minsheng Westin is definitely the right choice.

The location of the hotel is very good, basically in the middle of Haitang Bay, next to the duty-free shop, not far from Atlantis Water World, just walk past it. The check-in procedure is simple and convenient, and there are many entertainment items to send. Including free drink water in the guest room, the price of charged drinks will be clearly marked, so that customers can rest assured that the overall price/performance ratio is still very good.
The hotel is arc-shaped and the corridor is very long. Although there are only nine floors, there are many rooms. The first floor is a pool room, and the top floor is a presidential suite with a fixed net swimming pool. I really like this hotel, I will choose to stay in the future if I have the opportunity.
It is recommended to press a few plugs at the head of the bed and it is not convenient at all, otherwise the charging is uncomfortable in the middle of the night. The service is very good.

The hotel has a large garden area, and you can feel the island style in the hotel. It is 5 minutes away from the duty-free shop and the beach. It is worthwhile to come to Haitang Bay to stay in Westin. Recommended!

The hotel environment is very good, the swimming pool It is very suitable for children to play in the water. It is also close to the beach by walking. The breakfast is rich and there are also rich baby walking courses. The room type selected this time is very suitable for a family holiday. Disadvantages: the room door lock should be upgraded, it is inconvenient to close the door, and several times the room card cannot be opened after the door is closed hard.

posted:Posted June 10, 2021
msg:Take advantage of the summer vacation to take the baby and parents to Sanya on vacation. In the second half of the journey, I stayed at the Westin Haitang Bay. The service was very good during the whole trip. The hotel has very rich parent-child activities, and there are fun lessons for children from morning to night. The day before check-in, Miss Dong Ling from the hotel‚Äôs VIP service contacted me and added WeChat, helped to book a 5% discount on duty-free shops, and helped to book lessons for children. All kinds of problems can be solved quickly as long as WeChat is her. On the day of check-out Since the hotel is full, we can only help us to delay check-out until one point, but we are on a 9:30 p.m. plane and plan to spend the afternoon at the hotel until the evening, she helped us arrange a VIP room in the spa for us to rest. Teacher Liuliu, who teaches the baking and handicraft courses to the children, is also very kind and patient. The children have a great time, and they still miss her when they come back. Next time I go to Sanya, it will definitely be the Westin Hotel~

name:h‚Äça‚Äçr‚Äçr‚Äçi‚Äçe‚Äçs
info:Lagoon King Room
info:Stayed in May 2021
info:Family
info:7 Reviews
rating:5
posted:Posted June 16, 2021
msg:As a Marriott member, I stay in Sanya every year under the Marriott banner. The Westin Haitang Bay is right next to the duty-free shop. If you shop, the hotel will have a trolley to help you deliver it to the side entrance, and you will be there in two minutes.
All of them belong to the Marriott Group. The environmental facilities and services are not only a little bit higher than that of Sheraton. The pool room and VIP service Dongling called in advance to confirm the itinerary and arrange the room. I would like to express my gratitude.
The check-in was very efficient, the waiter introduced clearly, and there was no crowded queues. It was the best check-in experience for this trip (four hotels this time, Park Hyatt, MGM, Sheraton, Westin)
After check-in, the butler will take you into the room. It is very considerate to give you a general introduction. Two big coconuts will be presented to welcome guests in the afternoon. The minibar drinks are replenished every day, there is sugar-free coke, and sweet snacks are also delivered, which are meticulous and warm.
Although there are many people at breakfast, it is basically ok, and it doesn't look messy.
The overall green area of the hotel is large, but it does not feel that there are a lot of mosquitoes. It should be killed every day. The swimming pool is very good and clear. The area is very large. The service staff are very meticulous and friendly. There are experience activities every day. Transparent boats and paddle boards. , Internet celebrity swimming laps, etc.
For my birthday, I set up a restaurant by the seaside of the hotel. The location is very good and the products are average, but the service is very meticulous and caring. The restaurant manager communicated very friendly and presented small cakes.
There is a children‚Äôs playground on the ground floor. There are also parent-child activities every day. The baby can be hosted for a separate fee. There are also many places suitable for online celebrities to take pictures and check in.
Since we applied for a late check-out on a night flight, but we did not give it, it may be because the pool room type is more popular. It is the only hotel that did not make delay arrangements for this trip, nor did it arrange other things like Crown Plaza, which focuses on parents and children. Room rest (the suites ordered by Crowne Plaza are also very popular, but the hotel has arranged for the extension of ordinary room types). Fortunately, the housekeeper Dong Ling also carefully arranged a place to rest, thank you.
The whole experience is very comfortable, whether it's parent-child, online celebrity check-in, shopping all unified online

To sum up, Westin is still a hotel worthy of our visit again. The service is the most satisfying for us, and the details will be perfect if it is improved.
